name: Tech Econ Job Market Guide
description: How to land a tech economist role. Resume tips, interview prep, and what companies look for.

name: Data Science Interview Prep
description: Stats, ML, and product sense interview guides. Good for economist to tech transitions.

name: Econ Job Market Rumors - Industry
description: Forum for industry economics jobs. Salary discussions, interview experiences, company reviews.

name: Glassdoor Economist Salaries
description: Salary data for economist roles at tech companies. Filter by company, level, and location.

name: Econ Twitter / X
description: Follow tech economists, join the conversation. @caaborwn, @nickchk, @gaborcsardi, @instrumenthull.

name: Economics Stack Exchange
description: Q&A for professional economists. Great for technical questions on methods and theory.

name: Cross Validated (Stats SE)
description: Q&A for statistics and ML. Essential for causal inference and econometrics questions.

name: r/econometrics
description: Reddit community for econometrics. Mix of students, academics, and industry practitioners.

name: Causal Inference Discord
description: Active community discussing causal inference methods. Research papers, code help, job postings.

name: NBER Working Papers
description: Latest economics research papers. Filter by program (IO, Labor, Public) to stay current.

name: arXiv econ.EM
description: Preprints in econometrics. Where new methods appear before journals.

name: SSRN Economics
description: Working papers across economics. Good for finding applied work before publication.
